items.title: MMM Opportunities of Using Causal Inference
items.description: Integrating causal inference into Marketing Mix Models transforms correlation-based marketing analytics into powerful decision engines that reveal the true impact of campaigns.

items.title: How We Created Our First Talk-to-Data (Text-to-SQL) Application in Production
items.description: Delving into the R&D journey of creating a pioneering Text-to-SQL tool, exploring the intersection of data governance, business language challenges, and the semantic power of LLMs.

items.title: Where LLMs still fail
items.description: An exploration of current limitations in Large Language Models (LLM) through concrete examples, revealing their surprising struggles with seemingly simple tasks.

items.title: Optimizing Chatbot Performance: A Two-Phase Methodology for Enhanced Performance in HR Policy Responses
items.description: At Ekimetrics, we've tackled the challenge of ensuring the relevance and accuracy of chatbot responses by developing a cutting-edge chatbot system designed to navigate the complex landscape of HR policies.

items.title: Bayesian Neural Networks
items.description: Bayesian neural networks (BNNs) is a pioneering approach that embraces uncertainty as a strength.

items.title: Multimodal Deep Learning
items.description: Understand why multimodal deep learning models are more accurate than assembled unimodal models.

items.title: Uncertainty in time series forecasting
items.description: Discover uncertainty quantification for time series forecasting.

items.title: Maths Men: The Economics of Online Advertising
items.description: Willing to learn about the online ad market, cross-media effects and contextual advertising? This article wraps up the content of a PhD thesis on the economics of online advertising, defended by Rémi Devaux, Senior Consultant at Ekimetrics.

items.title: ClimateQ&A
items.description: AI to make climate and biodiversity science more accessible.

items.title: Does your company level with your car in terms of Analytics?
items.description: See what ABS and ESP do in a car and what it corresponds to in a company. This article advocates real-time analytics for ML insights.

items.title: Building a datalake - Part 2 - Smart storage & computing strategies for better usability and usefulness
items.description: For this second part of datalake building, we’ll go deeper into the journey of data, more specifically expand on storage and compute strategies.

items.title: Exploring the links between creative execution and marketing effectiveness - Part V: Key Paths to Success and Common Pitfalls to Avoid
items.description: In this last part, we outline the key learnings from this project, including key paths to success and common pitfalls to avoid.

items.title: Exploring the links between creative execution and marketing effectiveness - Part IV: MMM for Creative Marketing Effectiveness
items.description: In this Part IV we explore the MMM methodology applied.

items.title: Exploring the links between creative execution and marketing effectiveness - Part III: Tesseract Pre-Trained Optical Character Recognition Models
items.description: In this Part III we explore the methodology for using Tesseract to detect text in creative images.

items.title: Exploring the links between creative execution and marketing effectiveness - Part II Custom trained Detectron2 for OD
items.description: In this Part II we explore the methodology for training Detectron2 models to detect brand-specific object in creative images.

items.title: Exploring the links between creative execution and marketing effectiveness - Part I: Detectron2 Pre-Trained Object Detection Models
items.description: In this Part I we explore the methodology for using pre-trained Detectron2 models to detect brand-specific object in creative images.

items.title: Interpreting its sentiment analysis algorithm: BERT and its attention coefficients (2/2)
items.description: Two illustrations of how attention coefficients can be a source of interpretability

items.title: Interpreting its sentiment analysis algorithm: BERT and its attention coefficients (1/2)
items.description: Two illustrations of how attention coefficients can be a source of interpretability

items.title: Newsletter for September 2022
items.description: Hi everyone, We are now in September and we release our 6th Newsletter! Ranging from podcasts to tutorials, this Newsletter is made for practicioners!

items.title: Deep RL and Optimization applied to Operations Research problem - 2/2 Reinforcement Learning approach
items.description: This article is part of a series of articles which will introduce several optimization techniques, from traditional (yet advanced) Mathematical Optimization solvers and associated packages to Deep Reinforcement Learning algorithms, while tackling a very famous Operations Research problem: the multi-knapsack problem. Here, the focus is on traditional optimization techniques.

items.title: Deep RL and Optimization applied to Operations Research problem - 1/2 Traditional Optimization techniques
items.description: This article is part of a series of articles which will introduce several optimization techniques, from traditional (yet advanced) Mathematical Optimization solvers and associated packages to Deep Reinforcement Learning algorithms, while tackling a very famous Operations Research problem: the multi-knapsack problem. Here, the focus is on traditional optimization techniques.
